1.content:
Welcome!

Please chose you favorite Rugrat and train them the importance of potty training.
1.title: Welcome!

11.content: What story is going to be the first potty adventure of Tommy?
11.title: Tommy Pickles

111.content: Did he get a special kind of potty?
111.title: Story 1

112.content: Will his parents let him go naked during potty-training?
112.title: Story 2

113.content:
One day, Tommy and Chuckie were in Tommy's house, playing with Chuckie's Bogo Block village in the playpen. They were having a good time, when suddenly, Tommy stopped to ask Chuckie a question.

"Chuckie, what's it like to be potty trained?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Tommy.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you go potty?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"They do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone. Why do you ask?" Chuckie asked Tommy. Before Tommy could answer, he heard Didi.

"There you are, Tommy." She said. Didi was carrying a potty seat. It wasn't Chuckie's, but it looked a little like it, except it was blue and white. She set the potty down in the playpen.

"Time for your potty check." Didi told Tommy, then she untaped his diaper, which was dry.

"Good boy. You must be excited to learn to use the potty just like Chuckie." Didi told Tommy. She picked him up and sat him down on the potty.

"Now, you be a good boy and stay on your potty. Mommy will be right back to check on you. Maybe Chuckie can help." Didi told Tommy, then she went into the kitchen to throw the diaper away.

"That's why." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh. Do you need to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Hmmm, not right now." Tommy told Chuckie. He climbed off his potty, then walked over to the Bogo Block village, not caring that he wasn't wearing his diaper.

"Come on, Chuckie! Let's go back to playing!" Tommy told Chuckie. Chuckie was reluctant upon seeing Tommy diaperless, but decided to go back to playing with him anyway.

What happens next?
113.title: Story 3

choices: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside
Didi holds off on potty-training Tommy
1131.content:
Chuckie reached for the townsperson closest to Tommy, when all of a sudden, he felt a wet spot on the floor. It didn't take long for him to figure out where it came from.

"Uh, Tommy?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Yes, Chuckie?" Tommy replied.

"I think you forgetted to go potty in the potty." Chuckie told Tommy, who looked down at the wet spot in front of him.

"Oops. Sorry, Chuckie." Tommy said, feeling a little embarrassed.

Didi walked back into the living room, and was shocked when she saw that Tommy accidentally peed on the floor.

"Oh, dear!" She said, feeling worried.

What happens next?
1131.title: Tommy has to pee

11311.content:
Didi was determined not to give up on potty-training Tommy, so she decided to try a different strategy. She took Tommy, still diaperless, outside along with his potty, as well as Chuckie. This way, if Tommy had another accident, it wouldn't stain the carpet.

"Now, you boys play nicely outside while Mommy cleans the oopsie out of the carpet." Didi told Tommy and Chuckie.

What happens next?
11311.title: Didi takes Tommy and Chuckie outside

113111.content: Does Chuckie try to teach Tommy how to use the potty?
113111.title: Reader's Choice 1

1131111.content:
When Chuckie saw that Didi had also brought his potty outside, he decided to teach Tommy how to use the potty.

"Tommy, do you have to go potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"I don't know." Tommy told Chuckie, feeling unsure. The last time he thought he didn't have to go, he accidentally peed on the floor, so he didn't know if he had to go this time or not.

"You should probably use your potty now before you have another accident." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Good idea, Chuckie." replied Tommy.

"Here, I'll help you." Chuckie said as he brought his potty to Tommy.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to go potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Tommy, then he pulled down his pants and underwear. Since Tommy's diaper was already off, he imagined he was wearing it and taking it off.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do is sit on my potty." Chuckie told Tommy, then he sat down on his potty. Tommy then sat down on his potty.

"Then... I... go." Chuckie said nervously as he felt a sudden urge to pee.

"Are you okay, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Yes, I'm fine!" Chuckie said nervously. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he did want a set a good example for his best friend, especially because he wanted Stu and Didi to be proud of Tommy for using his potty. Chuckie closed his eyes and imagined that Tommy wasn't there. Then, he peed into his potty, sighing with relief afterwards. Tommy watched Chuckie and tried to do as he did.

Did Tommy use his potty?
1131111.title: Yes

113112.content: Did Tommy decide to take off his shirt as well?
113112.title: Reader's Choice 2

11312.content: Will Didi put a new diaper on Tommy?
11312.title: Didi holds off on potty-training Tommy

113121.content:
Didi could see that Tommy wasn't ready to be potty-trained yet, so she decided to hold off on potty-training him for the time being. She went up to his bedroom and got one of his clean diapers. Then she returned to the living room.

"Okay, Tommy. Let's get this diaper on!" She said, then she taped the diaper onto his bottom.

"There. It's okay if you're not ready to use the potty right now. Just tell Mommy when you are, okay?" She asked him. She then decided to take him and Chuckie somewhere else to play while she cleaned up the stain.

Where did Didi take Tommy and Chuckie?
113121.title: Yes

1131211.content: Was Tommy happy that he gets to keep wearing diapers?
1131211.title: Tommy's Bedroom

choices: He Found Them Soft and Comfortable
He Could Go Potty Wherever and Whenever He Wanted
11312111.content: Why was Tommy happy that he got to keep wearing diapers?
11312111.title: Yes

1131212.content: Was Tommy happy that he gets to keep wearing diapers?
1131212.title: Tommy's Backyard

choices: He Found Them Soft and Comfortable
He Could Go Potty Wherever and Whenever He Wanted
11312121.content: Why was Tommy happy that he got to keep wearing diapers?
11312121.title: Yes

1132.content:
As the boys continued to play, Chuckie suddenly felt a strong urge to pee. Tommy was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I gotta go potty, but I don't think I can make it to the bathroom in time! Can I use your potty?" Chuckie asked Tommy. Tommy's potty was the closest one available.

Does Tommy let Chuckie use his potty?
1132.title: Chuckie has to pee

choices: No, He Had to Poop as Well.
11321.content:
"Sure, Chuckie. You can use my potty. I don't have to go potty right now anyway." Tommy told Chuckie.

"Oh, thank you, Tommy!" Chuckie exclaimed. He ran over to Tommy's potty, then he pulled down his pants and underwear and sat down on it. He sighed with relief as he peed in it, not caring that Tommy was nearby. It wasn't long before Chuckie's bladder was empty and Tommy's potty was full.

Was Chuckie finished using Tommy's potty?
11321.title: Yes

113211.content:
At last, Chuckie was finished peeing. He climbed off Tommy's potty and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Thanks, Tommy." Chuckie told Tommy.

"You're welcome, Chuckie." Tommy said as he walked up to his full potty and looked down at Chuckie's pee inside it.

"Wow, Chuckie! You really had to pee!" Tommy exclaimed. At that moment, Didi returned.

Did she mistake Tommy looking into his full potty for him actually having used it?
113211.title: Yes

1133.content: Did one of them need to poop?
1133.title: Other

12.content: How does Chuckie get trained?
12.title: Chuckie Finster

choices: Not bad, but, let's try other ideas.
121.content: Hmmm. Here's an idea that might work. What if Susie was in Chuckie Vs The Potty and helped him with it?
121.title: Story 1

1212.content: Could we look at this story through Chuckie's point of view?
1212.title: Not bad, but, let's try other ideas.

122.content:
Chuckie had just gotten back from a check-up with the doctor, who informed Chas that Chuckie had a potassium deficiency and needed to drink more orange juice. Chuckie followed the doctor's orders, but as a result, he needed to pee more often.

Where was Chuckie spending the day today?
122.title: Story 2

choices: Chuckie Makes it to the Potty
Tommy Suggests that Chuckie Pee on the Tree
1221.content:
Chas took Chuckie to Tommy's house to play. Tommy and Chuckie were playing in the sandbox in Tommy's backyard, when all of a sudden, Chuckie started squirming uncomfortably. Tommy was quick to notice.

"Tommy, I gotta go potty!" Chuckie told Tommy.

"So go ahead and go, Chuckie. I'll be fine out here." Tommy assured Chuckie. As Tommy wore a diaper, he could go wherever and wherever he wanted.

"Okay, Tommy. I'll be right back." Chuckie assured Tommy, and he ran as fast as he could.

What happens next?
1221.title: Tommy's House

choices: Tommy Tells Chuckie to Take Off His Wet Pants
12212.content:
Chuckie ran as fast as he could, but he didn't get very far. By the time he got to the back porch, he couldn't hold it anymore and began to pee his pants. Tommy gasped when he saw what happened. Poor Chuckie was so upset that he had an accident in front of his best friend that he started crying. Tommy walked up to Chuckie and put his hand on Chuckie's back to calm him down.

"Don't feel bad, Chuckie. Accidents happen." Tommy assured Chuckie.

"Thanks, Tommy." Chuckie said, feeling a little better. He was glad he had a friend like Tommy to comfort him in his time of need, but he still felt wet and uncomfortable.

"What am I gonna do, Tommy? I can't let your mommy and daddy see me like this, they might make me wear a diaper! I can't go back to wearing diapers, I'm potty-trained now! Or at least I was." Chuckie told Tommy.

What happens next?
12212.title: Chuckie Pees His Pants

122121.content:
Tommy thought for a minute, then he got an idea.

"Chuckie, if you don't want to wear your wet pants, why don't you just take them off?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"But Tommy, I don't want to be half-nakie! It's just not natural!" Chuckie complained. Chuckie was very sensitive about his body.

"Come on, Chuckie, take em off!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"I... I... Oh, I don't know." Chuckie said, feeling very unsure.

"Just think about it, Chuckie. Do you really want to be stuck wearing wet pants for the rest of the day?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

Does Chuckie Take Off His Wet Pants?
122121.title: Tommy Tells Chuckie to Take Off His Wet Pants

1221211.content:
Chuckie thought about what Tommy said. He then remembered when Tommy, Phil, and Lil all took off their clothes to be naked like Spike. They were all happy and didn't judge each other. Chuckie decided he didn't want to wear wet pants, so he decided to take Tommy's advice and take them off.

"Okay, Tommy. I'll do it!" Chuckie told Tommy, and he proceeded to undress himself. First, he kicked off his shoes and socks, then he pulled down his wet pants and underwear and kicked them off. Chuckie was now naked from the waist down, but he was so happy to be out of his wet pants and underwear that he smiled and giggled. He didn't even care that Tommy was watching him undress the entire time.

What happens next?
1221211.title: Yes

12212111.content:
Tommy was impressed when he saw Chuckie naked from the waist down.

"Wow, Chuckie! That looks like fun! I wanna try it!" Tommy exclaimed. He then untaped his diaper, which was still dry, sighing with relief as it fell to the ground. Chuckie smiled and giggled. He knew that Tommy took off his diaper so that he wouldn't have to feel silly about being naked from the waist down.

"Come on, Chuckie, let's go back to playtime! Tommy told Chuckie, and the two toddlers walked back to the sandbox, neither one caring that they were naked from the waist down. Chuckie knew that Stu or Didi could be seeing them like this at any time, so he decided he might as well enjoy the moment while it lasted. He giggled as the cool wind tickled his bare bottom.

Who comes out to check on Tommy and Chuckie?
12212111.title: Tommy Takes Off His Diaper

122121111.content: Stu went outside to check on Tommy and Chuckie. Did he freak out at the sight of them half-naked?
122121111.title: Stu

1221211111.content:
"Don't worry, Deed. I just want to check on the... AAAHHH!" Stu cried at the sight of Tommy and Chuckie naked from the waist down. Didi heard his scream from inside the house.

"Stu, what's wrong?" Didi asked Stu.

"Oh, nothing. Chuckie just took off his pants and Tommy just took off his diaper." Stu told Didi.

"Well, put them back on!" Didi called to Stu.

Who does Stu try to put back in their clothes first?
1221211111.title: Yes

12212111112.content:
Stu decided to re-dress Chuckie first. When he picked up Chuckie's pants, he felt how wet they were, and suddenly understood why Chuckie took them off. Stu was now in a perilous situation. He knew that Chas would be coming back to pick Chuckie up soon. He didn't want to send Chuckie home in wet pants, but he also didn't want to send him home half-naked.

What does Stu do?
12212111112.title: Chuckie

122121111121.content: Does Stu try to put a diaper on Chuckie?
122121111121.title: Reader's Choice 1

1221211111211.content: Did Stu get the idea when he saw Tommy's untaped diaper on the ground?
1221211111211.title: Yes

choices: Stu Puts Tommy's Diaper Back On
12212111112111.content:
When Stu saw Tommy's untaped diaper lying on the ground, he got an idea. He didn't really like the idea of making Chuckie wear a diaper, but he didn't have a lot of options. He went up to Tommy's bedroom and got one of Tommy's clean diapers from the changing table. Then he went back outside and walked up to Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie. Let's get this diaper on!" Stu said to Chuckie as he taped the diaper onto his bottom.

"There you go. That'll keep you dressed until till your daddy comes back to pick you up." Stu told Chuckie.

What happens next?
12212111112111.title: Yes

122121111121111.content:
"Okay, Champ, now let's get your diaper back on." Stu told Tommy. He picked up Tommy's untaped diaper and taped it back onto his bottom.

"There. Now you boys just keep your diapers on this time." Stu told Tommy and Chuckie, and he went back into Tommy's house.

How did Chuckie feel about wearing a diaper?
122121111121111.title: Stu Puts Tommy's Diaper Back On

choices: Show Chuckie That Wearing Diapers Can Be Fun
Tell Chuckie to Take Off His Diaper
1221211111211112.content:
Chuckie didn't like wearing the diaper that Stu put on him.

"I knew this was going to happen, Tommy. I knew sooner or later your mommy or daddy would make me wear a diaper! I don't want to wear diapers, I like being potty-trained!" Chuckie complained. Feeling partially responsible for what happened, Tommy wanted to make things right for Chuckie again.

What does Tommy do?
1221211111211112.title: He Didn't Like it

12212111112111122.content:
"Chuckie, if you don't want to wear your diapie, then just take it off." Tommy told Chuckie.

Does Chuckie take off his diaper?
12212111112111122.title: Tell Chuckie to Take Off His Diaper

122121111121111222.content:
"That's what got us in trouble in the first place, Tommy. Asides, your daddy told us both to keep our diapers on." Chuckie reminded Tommy. As much as he disliked wearing the diaper, Chuckie didn't want to get into any more trouble with Tommy's parents, so he decided to keep it on.

What happens next?
122121111121111222.title: No

1221211111211112221.content:
Betty arrived with Phil and Lil and dropped them off in Tommy's backyard. Betty didn't notice Chuckie wearing a diaper, but Phil and Lil certainly did.

Did both twins ask Chuckie why he was wearing a diaper or just one?
1221211111211112221.title: Phil and Lil Came Over

122121112.content: Didi went outside to check on Tommy and Chuckie. Did she freak out when she saw them half-naked?
122121112.title: Didi

1221211122.content:
When Didi saw Tommy and Chuckie half-naked, she remained calm.

Does Didi try to re-dress Tommy and Chuckie?
1221211122.title: No

12212111221.content: Didi decided to re-dress Tommy and Chuckie. Who did she try to put back in their clothes first?
12212111221.title: Yes

122121112212.content:
Didi decided to re-dress Chuckie first. When she picked up his pants, she felt how wet they were, and suddenly understood why he took them off. Didi was worried that Chuckie was regressing. She also worried about what she was going to do when Chas came back to pick Chuckie up. She didn't want to send him home half-naked, but she also didn't want to send him home in wet pants.

What does Didi do?
122121112212.title: Chuckie

1221211122121.content: Does Didi try to put a diaper on Chuckie?
1221211122121.title: Reader's Choice 1

12212111221211.content: Did she get the idea when she saw Tommy's untaped diaper on the ground?
12212111221211.title: Yes

choices: Didi Puts Tommy's Diaper Back On
122121112212111.content:
When Didi saw Tommy's untaped diaper lying on the ground, she got an idea. She didn't really like the idea of making Chuckie wear a diaper, but she didn't have a lot of options. She went up to Tommy's bedroom and got one of Tommy's clean diapers from the changing table. Then she went back outside and walked up to Chuckie.

"Okay, Chuckie. Let's get this diaper on!" Didi said to Chuckie as she taped the diaper onto his bottom.

"There you go. That'll keep you dressed until your daddy comes to pick you up. Didi told Chuckie.

What happens next?
122121112212111.title: Yes

1221211122121111.content:
"Okay, Tommy. Now let's get your diaper back on." Didi told Tommy. She picked up Tommy's untaped diaper and taped it back onto his bottom.

"There. Now you boys be good and keep your diapers on." Didi told Tommy and Chuckie as she went back into Tommy's house.

How did Chuckie feel about wearing a diaper?
1221211122121111.title: Didi Puts Tommy's Diaper Back On

choices: Show Chuckie That Wearing Diapers Can Be Fun
Tell Chuckie to Take Off His Diaper
12212111221211112.content:
Chuckie didn't like wearing the diaper that Didi put on him.

"I knew this was going to happen, Tommy. I knew sooner or later your mommy or daddy would make me wear a diaper! I don't want to wear diapers, I like being potty-trained!" Chuckie complained. Feeling partially responsible for what happened, Tommy wanted to make things right for Chuckie again.

What does Tommy do?
12212111221211112.title: He Didn't Like it

122121112212111121.title: Show Chuckie That Wearing Diapers Can Be Fun

1221211122121111211.content:
"But Chuckie, wearing diapies can be fun!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"How?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Well, they're soft and comforble, you can keep stuff in them, and they're easy to take off if you ever need to!" Tommy told Chuckie.

"I don't know about this, Tommy." Chuckie said nervously.

"And bestest of all, if you have to go potty, you don't have to run to the bathroom; you can just go in your diapie and keep playing!" Tommy told Chuckie.

Did Chuckie like the idea of not needing to run to the bathroom when he had to go potty?
1221211122121111211.title: RC 1

122121112212111122.content:
"Chuckie, if you don't want to wear your diapie, then just take it off." Tommy told Chuckie.

Does Chuckie take off his diaper?
122121112212111122.title: Tell Chuckie to Take Off His Diaper

1221211122121111222.content:
"That's what got us in trouble in the first place, Tommy. Asides, your mommy told us both to keep our diapers on." Chuckie reminded Tommy. As much as he disliked wearing the diaper, Chuckie didn't want to get into any more trouble with Tommy's parents, so he decided to keep it on.

What happens next?
1221211122121111222.title: No

12212111221211112221.content:
Betty arrived with Phil and Lil and dropped them off in Tommy's backyard. Betty didn't notice Chuckie wearing a diaper, but Phil and Lil certainly did.

Did both twins ask Chuckie why he was wearing a diaper or just one?
12212111221211112221.title: Phil and Lil Came Over

122122.content: Hmmm. Do Tommy, or Phil or Lil try to put Chuckie into a diaper?
122122.title: Other

12213.content:
Chuckie suddenly stopped, and Tommy was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I don't think I can make it to the potty in time!" Chuckie told Tommy. Tommy thought, then he had an idea.

"Chuckie, why don't you just pee on the tree?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"I can't do that, Tommy!" Chuckie protested.

"Why not? Spike does it all the time." Tommy told Chuckie.

Chuckie wasn't sure what to do. He knew he couldn't make it to the potty, and he didn't want to pee on the tree, but he didn't want to pee his pants, either.

Does Chuckie decide to pee on the tree?
12213.title: Tommy Suggests that Chuckie Pee on the Tree

122131.content:
Chuckie decided to take Tommy's advice and pee on the tree.

"Okay, Tommy. I'll do it!" Chuckie told Tommy. He ran up to the tree, then looked back in case Stu or Didi was watching.

Were they?
122131.title: Yes

1221312.content:
Fortunately for Chuckie, neither Stu nor Didi was watching him. They were both inside, drinking coffee and talking to each other. Chuckie pulled down his pants and his underwear, then he started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief.

What happens next?
1221312.title: No

choices: Chuckie Pulls His Pants Back Up
12213121.content:
Tommy walked up to Chuckie and was impressed when he saw him peeing on the tree.

"Wow, Chuckie! That looks like fun! I wanna try it!" Tommy exclaimed. He then untaped his diaper, which was still dry, and let it fall to the ground. Shortly after taking his diaper off, Tommy started peeing on the tree and sighed with relief.

"It feels nice not to need my diapie changed." Tommy said as he continued going pee. The two toddlers continued to pee on the tree until at last, their bladders were empty.

What happens next?
12213121.title: Tommy Pees on the Tree

choices: Look For a Place For Chuckie to Poop
Give His Diaper to Chuckie and Let Him Use It
122131211.content:
Suddenly, Chuckie felt an uncomfortable feeling in his bottom.

"Uh, Tommy, what if we have to poop?" Chuckie asked Tommy.

"Why do you ask?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"Because right now, I really need to poop!" Chuckie told Tommy.

What does Tommy do?
122131211.title: Chuckie Has To Poop

choices: Hmm, something else he did instead.
1221312112.content:
"Use my diapey, if you want."
Desperate, he accepted.
After all was said and done, Tommy snuck inside, and got a diaper for Chuckie to put on, and one for himself?
1221312112.title: Give His Diaper to Chuckie and Let Him Use It

12213121122.content: Did Chuckie put the diaper that Tommy had taken off on his own bottom instead?
12213121122.title: Hmm, something else he did instead.

122131211221.content: Did Tommy help him with this, though?
122131211221.title: Yes

1221312112211.content:
Tommy picked up his untaped diaper, and Chuckie pulled up his shirt as Tommy taped his diaper onto his bottom. Shortly after the diaper was taped on, Chuckie grunted, then sighed with relief as he pooped in it.

"Thanks, Tommy. I feel better now." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Happy to help, Chuckie." Tommy assured Chuckie.

What happens next?
1221312112211.title: Yeah.

12213121122111.content: Does Chuckie get diapers for them both?
12213121122111.title: Reader's Choice 1

choices: Chuckie Makes it to Tommy's Bedroom
Chuckie is Caught by Stu or Didi
122131211221111.content:
"Since you helped me, Tommy, now I'm going to help you. I'm going to get us both new diapers." Chuckie told Tommy. He pulled his pants and underwear up over the dirty diaper he was wearing to avoid Stu and Didi seeing him wearing it.

"Thanks, Chuckie, and good luck." Tommy told Chuckie as Chuckie went into Tommy's house.

As Chuckie snuck into Tommy's house, did he make it to Tommy's bedroom, or did Stu or Didi catch him wearing a dirty diaper?
122131211221111.title: Sure.

choices: Yeah, but not before getting rid of the dirty one.
1221312112211111.content: He made it, and found the diapers, not forgetting the powder. Back outside, did he diaper himself first?
1221312112211111.title: Chuckie Makes it to Tommy's Bedroom

choices: Put a Clean Diaper on Tommy
12213121122111111.content:
Chuckie took off the dirty diaper he was wearing and balled it up so it could be disposed of. Once it was off, he wiped his bottom clean, then he powdered it. Finally, he taped the clean diaper onto his bottom.

What did Chuckie do next?
12213121122111111.title: Yeah, but not before getting rid of the dirty one.

122131211221111111.content: Did Tommy hold still as Chuckie went to work at this?
122131211221111111.title: Put a Clean Diaper on Tommy

choices: Chuckie Disposes of the Dirty Diaper
1221312112211111111.content:
"Okay, Tommy. Let's get your diaper on." Chuckie told Tommy.

Tommy lay down on his back and pulled up his shirt. Tommy's bottom was already clean, so Chuckie didn't need to wipe it. Chuckie powdered Tommy's bottom, then taped the clean diaper on it.

"There you go, good as new." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Tommy said.

"You're welcome, Tommy." Chuckie replied.

What happens next?
1221312112211111111.title: Yup.

12213121122111111111.content: Chuckie was able to get rid of the dirty diaper. Later, as both were playing, Susie came over, and Tommy explained what was going on?
12213121122111111111.title: Chuckie Disposes of the Dirty Diaper

122131211221111111112.content:
After Tommy and Chuckie diapered each other, Betty arrived with Phil and Lil and dropped them off in Tommy's backyard. Betty didn't notice Chuckie wearing a diaper, but Phil and Lil certainly did. The twins were both surprised and confused.

"Why are you wearing a diapie, Chuckie?" Lil asked Chuckie.

"Yeah, Chuckie. I thought you was potty-trained." Phil added.

What does Chuckie tell the twins?
122131211221111111112.title: Phil and Lil did.

choices: The Smell of the Dirty Diaper
The Sound of the Diaper Crinkling
1221312112211112.title: Chuckie is Caught by Stu or Didi

122131211221112.content: Did Tommy get the new diapers instead?
122131211221112.title: Hmmm, anything else.

choices: Phil and Lil come over, or something else that happens before he can.
1221312112211121.content: Tommy soon returned with two new diapers. Did he diaper Chuckie first, or himself?
1221312112211121.title: Yes

12213121122111211.content: Did Tommy need help putting his new diaper on?
12213121122111211.title: HImself.

122131211221112111.content: Was it Chuckie who helped get him into it?
122131211221112111.title: Yes

1221312112211121111.content:
"Okay, Tommy. Let's get your diaper on." Chuckie told Tommy. Tommy pulled up his shirt and held still as Chuckie taped the clean diaper onto his bottom.

"There you go. Good as new." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Thank you, Chuckie." Tommy replied.

Then it was Chuckie's turn to have his diaper changed.

What happens next?
1221312112211121111.title: Yeah.

choices: Felt the need to kick and babble like a baby.
12213121122111211111.content: Did Chuckie hold still as this was done?
12213121122111211111.title: Tommy Changes Chuckie's Diaper

12213121122111212.content:
Chuckie took off the dirty diaper he was wearing and balled it up so it could be disposed of. Then he picked up a nearby leaf and wiped his bottom clean with it.

"Okay, Tommy, I'm ready." Chuckie told Tommy as he pulled up his shirt. Tommy taped the new diaper onto Chuckie's bottom.

"Thanks again, Tommy." Chuckie told Tommy.

"Anytime, Chuckie." Tommy replied.

12213121122111213211.content:
Angelica found it rather humorous that Chuckie was not only a wearing diaper, but had pooped in it as well.

"I knew you was too scared to be without your diapers, Chuckie!" Angelica teased.

"It's not like that, Angelica. I am potty-trained. I just couldn't make it to the potty in time this time is all." Chuckie told Angelica.

"Yeah, right." Angelica said, not believing Chuckie's story.

"Face it, Finster. You're never gonna be a big kid like me if you go back to wearing diapers like Tommy." Angelica told Chuckie.

"Well, maybe I don't want to be a big kid like you! You ever think of that?" Replied Chuckie. Angelica was unfazed. Chuckie suddenly realized that Angelica was right, and he knew he had a decision to make.

1221312112211121321111.content:
Chuckie decided to prove to Angelica that he was still potty-trained, and the first step to that was to stop wearing diapers. He took off the dirty diaper he was wearing and balled it up so it could be disposed of. Then, after he wiped his bottom clean with a nearby leaf, he pulled his pants and underwear back up. He then turned to face Tommy.

"Thanks for helping me today, Tommy, but Angelica's right. I can't be a big kid if I spend the rest of my life in diapers." Chuckie told Tommy.

"I understand, Chuckie." Tommy replied. Tommy still preferred to wear diapers, but was fully supportive of Chuckie's decision to be potty-trained.

"Thank you. You can keep the extra diaper for yourself. Right now you need it more than I do." Chuckie told Tommy. Chuckie still preferred to use the potty, but he was fully supportive of Tommy's decision to wear diapers until he was ready to be potty-trained.

"I will, Chuckie." Tommy assured Chuckie.

"Well, it all started when I got back from the doctor's. The doctor said I had a pizzazzium efficiency and that I needed to drink more orange juice. I did, but it made me need to pee more often. When he dropped me off in the sandbox, I had to pee, but I didn't think I could make it to the potty in time, and I didn't want to wet my pants. Tommy suggested I pee on the tree like Spike, and so I did." Chuckie began.

"When I saw Chuckie peeing on the tree, it looked like fun, so I wanted to try it. I took off my diapie and peed on the tree with him. It felt nice not needing my diapie changed. Then Chuckie had to poop, so I let him use my diapie. He put it on and pooped in it. Of course, he needed to be changed, so I went into my bedroom and got each of us a clean diapie." Tommy added.

He wasn't fully comfortable with the idea of Tommy walking around diaperless, but Tommy did show interest in peeing somewhere other than his diaper, and Chuckie also knew that when Tommy gets an idea, it's no use trying to talk him out of it.

"Come on, Chuckie, let's go back to playing!" Tommy told Chuckie, and the two toddlers walked back to the sandbox to play some more, leaving Tommy's diaper sitting by the tree.

What happens next?
1221312122.title: No

12231.content:
Chuckie was going to Angelica's house today, as Drew and Charlotte volunteered to look after him while Chas had to work. Neither Chuckie nor Angelica looked forward to this, as the last time Chuckie stayed over at Angelica's house, things ended in disaster. Angelica had taken some toy handcuffs intended for donation that she wasn't supposed to touch and handcuffed her and Chuckie together. Though she did eventually manage to get herself free from Chuckie, she accidentally handcuffed herself to her bed and the key was just out of her reach. Because Chuckie refused to help her, Drew found out she took the handcuffs and punished her for disobeying him. However, if Angelica was nice to Chuckie today, he would lift her punishment.

"Now, you be nice to Chuckie today." Drew reminded Angelica.

"Okay, Daddy." Angelica said in a sweet tone. As much as she hated spending the day with Chuckie, she really wanted her punishment to be lifted. Just then, Chas arrived at the door with Chuckie.

"Hi, Drew." said Chas.

"Oh, hi, Chas. Hi, Chuckie." Drew said to Chas and Chuckie, the latter of whom smiled nervously.

"Listen, thanks for watching Chuckie for me." Chas told Drew.

"Sure." replied Drew.

"Bye, Chuckie. Be a good boy." Chas told Chuckie, and he left.

"Now, don't worry about a thing, Chas. We'll take good care of Chuckie!" Drew assured Chas, and he took Chuckie inside his house.

"Won't we, Angelica?" Drew asked Angelica.

"Oh, yes, Daddy. We'll have the bestest time." Angelica said as Drew left. Chuckie gulped nervously.

"Look, Angelica, I'm sorry I had to come over. You don't have to play with me or anything, I'll just sit here by myself on the floor till' my daddy comes back." Chuckie told Angelica as he sat on the floor.

Does Angelica decide to leave Chuckie alone?
12231.title: Angelica's House

122312.content:
"Never mind that, Chuckie. My daddy told me to be nice to you today, so today, we're going to play a game of hide-and-peek." Angelica told Chuckie. Chuckie was skeptical. The last time he and Angelica played hide-and-seek together ended in disaster, as Angelica took his glasses, rendering him unable to see properly.

"Wait a minute, Angelica. You're not gonna take my glasses like last time, are you?" Chuckie asked Angelica.

"Of course not, Chuckie." Angelica assured Chuckie. The last time she took his glasses, everything looked twisted and made her sick from spinning around. Chuckie was still unsure he wanted to play hide-and-seek with Angelica, but Angelica was trying to be nice to him and even promised she wouldn't take his glasses.

"Okay, Angelica, if it'll make you happy, I'll play hide-and-peek with you." said Chuckie reluctantly.

"Great!" said Angelica.

Who was the seeker?
122312.title: No

1223121.content:
"Now, I'll hide. You close your eyes and count to ten, and then try to find me." Angelica told Chuckie.

"Okay, Angelica." said Chuckie reluctantly. Suddenly, he felt an uncomfortable urge in his lower body. He knew this urge all too well.

"What's the matter now, Chuckie?" Angelica asked Chuckie.

"I gotta go potty!" Chuckie told Angelica, who groaned unhappily.

"But Chuckie, we just started the game!" complained Angelica.

"Can we start the game after I go potty?" Chuckie asked Angelica.

Does Angelica let Chuckie use the bathroom before they begin the game?
1223121.title: Chuckie

12231212.content:
"No, Chuckie. You can't use the potty until after we finish the game. If you find me, then you can go potty." Angelica told Chuckie.

"Well, okay." Chuckie said to Angelica. He took off his glasses, covered his eyes, and counted while Angelica hid. Because he was only two years old, his counting was atrocious.

"One, two, three, four, um... seven, six, eight, two, three, six, eight, seven, three, five, ten! Ready or not, here I come!". Chuckie tried to look around for Angelica, but it was very difficult to concentrate when he had to pee.

Where does Chuckie look for Angelica?
12231212.title: No

122312122.content: Did Chuckie go outside to look for Angelica?
122312122.title: Somewhere Else

1223121221.content:
Chuckie knew that Angelica's bathroom was all the way at the top of the stairs. He was worried he wouldn't make it to the bathroom in time, so he decided to go outside to Angelica's backyard. He walked up to a bush, then looked back to see if Drew or Charlotte was watching him.

Were they?
1223121221.title: Yes

12231212212.content:
Fortunately for Chuckie, neither Drew nor Charlotte was watching him, as they were both inside, tending to their work. He pulled down his pants and underwear and proceeded to pee in the bush.

Was Angelica hiding in the bush Chuckie was peeing in?
12231212212.title: No

choices: Make a Run For the Bathroom
12232.content:
Didi and Betty had invited Chas and Chuckie to join them and their children at the water park. Chas had dressed Chuckie in his bathing suit and a pair of water wings, and dropped him off in the kiddie pool with Tommy, Phil, and Lil. Tommy was dressed in his diaper and a pair of water wings, while Phil was dressed in his bathing suit and a pair of water wings, and Lil was dressed in her bathing suit and a pair of water wings. Chuckie squirmed uncomfortably as running water was all around him. Tommy was quick to notice.

"What's the matter, Chuckie?" Tommy asked Chuckie.

"All this water's making me have to go potty!" Chuckie complained.

"So why don't you just go in the water?" Phil asked Chuckie.

"Yeah, I'm doing it right now!" said Lil, and she sighed with relief as she wet her diaper. Chuckie looked disgusted when he saw this, but he knew he had a decision to make.

What does Chuckie do?
12232.title: The Water Park

122322.content:
Chuckie didn't want to pee in the water, so he decided to make a run for the bathroom.

What happened when he got there?
122322.title: Make a Run For the Bathroom

1223221.content: Did Chuckie run into a baby girl?
1223221.title: Reader's Choice 1

1223222.content: Did Chuckie wet his bathing suit?
1223222.title: Reader's Choice 2

13.content: How does Phil become toilet trained?
13.title: Phil Deville

14.content: How does Lil become toilet trained?
14.title: Lil Deville

15.content: How about these last few?
15.title: Last Few Rugrats

151.content: How does Angelica become toilet trained without any more accidents?
151.title: Angelica Pickles

1511.content: Could we talk about when Angelica first started potty-training?
1511.title: Story 1

15111.content: Did Angelica use to enjoy wearing diapers?
15111.title: Yes

choices: She could go potty whenever and wherever she wanted
151111.content: Why did Angelica like to wear diapers?
151111.title: Yes

1512.content:
Will Angelica's bladder and bowel control weaken,
which will make her have to go back to diapers?
1512.title: Story 2

152.content: how does Dil become potty trained since he is still young?
152.title: Dil Pickles

153.content: How does Kimi become toilet trained?
153.title: Kimi Finster

1531.content: Did Kimi want to be potty-trained?
1531.title: Story 1

15311.content:
Chuckie liked having Kimi as a little sister, but he didn't always like the things she did. One of the things Kimi would do is follow him into the bathroom whenever he needed to use the toilet. Kimi always wondered what it was like to use the potty, as she wore diapers and needed to be changed.

One afternoon, Kira had just changed Kimi's diaper when Kimi saw Chuckie running to the bathroom. Kimi followed Chuckie inside, much to Chuckie's ire.

"You gotta stop following me in here, Kimi. Sometimes a just needs his piracy!" Chuckie told Kimi.

"I'm sorry, Chuckie. It's just... I..." Kimi stammered.

"What, Kimi? What's so important that you gotta follow me into the bathroom?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"I just want to know what it's like to use the potty is all." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh." Chuckie said meekly. He now felt bad about snapping at Kimi, and was actually glad she showed interest in being potty-trained.

"Well, Kimi. I like being potty-trained. No more sticky diapers or waiting to be changed." Chuckie told Kimi.

"But don't the growed-ups watch you?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Well, they do at first, but after a while, they leave you alone." Chuckie assured Kimi.

Does Chuckie try to teach Kimi how to use the potty?
15311.title: Yes

153111.content:
"Would you like to learn how to use the potty today?" Chuckie asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh!" Kimi said excitedly.

"Okay." Chuckie said, and he got out his old clown potty for Kimi to use.

"Here, Kimi. You can use my old potty. Since I started going potty on the toilet, I hardly ever use it anymore." Chuckie told Kimi, then he began to teach her how to use the potty.

"Now, the first thing I do when I need to use the potty is take off my pants." Chuckie told Kimi, and he pulled down his pants and underwear. Kimi then untaped her diaper.

"Good. Now, the next thing I do sit it on the potty." Chuckie told Kimi, and he sat on the toilet. Kimi then sat on Chuckie's potty.

"Then... I... go... potty." Chuckie said nervously. Kimi was quick to notice.

"What's wrong, Chuckie?" Kimi asked Chuckie.

"Nothing, Kimi. I'm fine!" Chuckie told Kimi. Chuckie didn't like having to go potty for an audience, but he wanted to set a good example for his little sister. He closed his eyes and imagined Kimi wasn't in the bathroom with him. Then he sighed with relief as he peed into the toilet. Kimi watched Chuckie and tried to use his potty.

Does Kimi use Chuckie's potty?
153111.title: Yes

1531112.content:
Kimi sat on Chuckie's potty, but nothing came out. She stood up, looked into Chuckie's empty potty, and began to feel discouraged. Chuckie flushed the toilet, then climbed off it and pulled his pants and underwear back up.

"Chuckie, I don't think it's working. Nothing's coming out." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Oh. Sorry, Kimi." Chuckie said to Kimi as he washed his hands. Suddenly, he thought of something.

"Wait a minute, Kimi. Didn't your mommy just change your diaper?" He asked Kimi.

"Uh-huh." Kimi told Chuckie.

"Then you probably don't need to go potty right now." Chuckie told Kimi, who still felt discouraged.

"Don't feel bad, Kimi. You can try again whenever you want." Chuckie assured Kimi.

"Thanks, Chuckie." Kimi said, feeling a little better.

"Now let's put your diaper back on." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi pulled up her dress and held still as Chuckie taped her diaper back onto her bottom.

"Good. Now let's wash your hands and then we can play whatever you want." Chuckie told Kimi. Kimi washed her hands, and then she and Chuckie went into their bedroom to play together.

What happens next?
1531112.title: No

15311121.content: Someone came over to the Finsters' house to play with Chuckie and Kimi. Who was it?
15311121.title: Reader's Choice 1

1531112121.content:
The doorbell rang and Kira answered the door. Charlotte arrived with Angelica.

"Hi, Kira. Thanks for volunteering to watch Angelica while I work today." Charlotte told Kira.

"No problem, Charlotte. You know Angelica is always welcome in our house." replied Kira.

"Bye-bye, Angelica. Mommy will be back soon. Be good for Mr. and Mrs. Finster, okay?" Charlotte asked Angelica.

"Okay, Mommy. I will." Angelica said to Charlotte, then Charlotte left. Kira took Angelica to Chuckie and Kimi's bedroom to play.

"Now, you play nicely with Chuckie and Kimi." Kira told Angelica.

"I will, Mrs. Finster." Angelica said to Kira as Kira left for the kitchen. As soon as Kira was out of earshot, Angelica groaned. She hated babies and dreaded having to spend the day with Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hello, Finster, hello, Shorty." Angelica said unenthusiastically to Chuckie and Kimi.

"Hi, Angelica." Kimi said to Angelica. Suddenly, Angelica sniffed. Usually around this time, Kimi had used her diaper and needed to be changed, but today, she smelled clean.

"Hey, Shorty, why haven't you used your diaper?" Angelica asked Kimi.

"My mommy just changed me before you came here. Asides, Chuckie's teaching me how to use the potty today." Kimi told Angelica. Angelica was shocked when she heard this. She knew that once Kimi was potty-trained, she would stop wearing diapers, and she couldn't call her a dumb baby anymore. She also knew the same thing would eventually happen to Phil, Lil, and Tommy. As much as she hated babies, Angelica took delight in tormenting them, so she decided to keep Kimi in diapers for as long as she could.

How does she do this?
1531112121.title: Yes

15311121211.content:
Angelica looked around. When she saw one of Kimi's clean diapers on Kimi's changing table, she got an idea. She picked it up and taped it on over her tights.

"So, Kimi, I heard you're going to use the potty today." Angelica told Kimi as she walked up to her. Kimi was surprised when she saw Angelica wearing one of her diapers.

"Angelica, why are you wearing one of my diapies?" Kimi asked Angelica.

"Kimi, why waste all your time learning how to use the potty? When you wear a diaper, you can go potty wherever and whenever you want." Angelica told Kimi, and she sighed with relief as she pretended to use the diaper she was wearing.

Did seeing Angelica pretend to use her diaper make Kimi have to use the potty?
15311121211.title: Reader's Choice 1

15312.content: What did Kimi do about it?
15312.title: No

1531211.content: Where did Kimi run away to?
1531211.title: Yes

1532.content: Did her parents let her go naked during potty-training?
1532.title: Story 2

15321.content: Did they take off all of her clothes?
15321.title: Yes

154.content: how does Susie become fully trained?
154.title: Susie Carmichael

info.brief_description: A Story brought back from the dead to life. Train your Favorite babies to use the potty!
info.description:
This story was once someone else's, but it was sadly deleted for some reason 6 years ago, i believe.

Just follow these rules.

1.Keep it clean.
2. Diaper changes are allowed.
3. no weight gain
4. pooping and peeing in the diaper or training toilet is one of the main focuses.
5. Have fun!
